21634.「おお <pc>！ 待っておったぞ！\n 転送装置を動かす 三闘士のオノが\n:
<pc>! You're just in time!
The Axe of the Triad is finally finished!

21635.「これで カルサドラ火山に行けるぞよ！\n 余も やれば できるのじゃ！:
Now we can go inside the Calsadora Volcano!
See? Even I can do it if I put my mind to
it and try!

21636.「ふん！ そんな たいそうなもんを\n こしらえることが できるなんて……。\n:
Hmph! To think you were able to make somethin'
THAT fancy... Guess you're not who I thought
you were!

21637.「一日中 ぼーっとしてたときのアンタが\n いちばん キラキラ 輝いていたですよ:
You were at your brightest when you just
stood there all day spaced out! Just
hurry up and snap out of it!

21638.「……<pc> 準備はいい？\n ビャンくんが作った 三闘士のオノを使って\n:
You ready, <pc>? We'll head to the
crater in the volcano and use the Axe
that Byan made.

21639.「そして そこで あやしい儀式をしている\n 魔物たちを 撃退するの！:
That's when we'll beat up those monsters
and stop their weird ritual!

21640.「うむ。その魔物たちを率いるは\n 我が祖国のカタキ グルヤンラシュに相違ない。:
Yes. It must be that fiend Guryan Rush who is
leading those monsters. The time for revenge
is nigh!

21641.「火口付近へと通じる 古代の転送装置は\n モガリム街道を 南に抜けた先の\n:
The ancient transporter is located in the
center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just
south of the Mogarim Highway.

21642.「まずは ラニアッカ断層帯へ行き\n カルサドラ火山に 乗り込むとしようぞ！\n:
First, we go there and make our way into the
volcano! That is when I will exact my revenge!

21643.「うむ！ よくぞ申した！\n それでは ラニアッカ断層帯に\n 足を運ぶとするぞ:
Yes! Well said! Let's make our way towards
the Raniakka Fault Zone!

21644.「オノの彫像がある 円形の台座が転送装置じゃ。\n 起動器具の三闘士のオノは 余:
The circular pedestal that bears a statue of
an axe is the transporter. I will carry the
Axe, so please wait there.

21645.「ラニアッカにある 古代の転送装置か……。\n よし！ それじゃ 私は先に行くね:
So the transporter is in Raniakka...
Okay! I'll go on ahead. Meet you there!

21646.「それでは <pc>。\n 我らも 出立するとしようぞ。\n 余は そちの後を:
Let us depart as well, <pc>.
I will follow behind you.

21647.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
...What's this?! It seems you're too burdened
with requests from other common folk to help
with mine.

21648.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Well, no matter. I'm a magnanimous man.
However, this situation is time sensitive.
Don't dally too long with your other requests.

21649.「……なんと！ この出陣の気炎の中\n そちは 奮い立たぬと申すか！\n 見損な:
What?! Amidst this call to battle, you are
still not inspired?! I am disappointed in you!

21650.「とはいえ 頼れるのは そちしか おらぬ。\n そう言わずに 手を貸してくれぬか:
Even still...you are the only person I can
rely on. Won't you reconsider? I will
be here, so please think it over.

21651.「おお <pc>よ よくぞ来た！\n 余と共に カルサドラ火山に\n 行ってくれ:
Oh, <pc>! You've returned!
So you have decided to come with me
to the volcano after all?

21652.「三闘士のオノを使い 転送装置を動かせば\n 魔物たちが あやしい儀式をしている:
If we use the Axe to activate the transporter,
then we can make our way into the crater
to put a stop to those monsters!

21653.「儀式をしている魔物を率いるは\n 我が祖国のカタキ グルヤンラシュに相違ない。:
It must be that fiend Guryan Rush who is
leading those monsters. The time for revenge
is nigh!

21654.「火口付近へと通じる 古代の転送装置は\n モガリム街道を 南に抜けた先の\n:
The ancient transporter is located in the
center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just
south of the Mogarim Highway.

21655.「まずは ラニアッカ断層帯へ行き\n カルサドラ火山に 乗り込むとしようぞ！\n:
First, we'll head to the Raniakka Fault Zone
to make our way into the volcano!
<pc>! Are you with me?!

21656.「今こそ 古代の転送装置を使い\n グルヤンラシュが暗躍する カルサドラ火山の\:
We shall use the transporter to make our way
to the crater, where the wicked Guryan Rush
awaits!

21657.「火口付近へと通じる 古代の転送装置は\n モガリム街道を 南に抜けた先の\n:
The ancient transporter is located in the
center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just
south of the Mogarim Highway.

21658.「オノの彫像がある 円形の台座が転送装置じゃ。\n 起動器具の 三闘士のオノは:
The circular pedestal that bears a statue of
an axe is the transporter. I will carry the
Axe, so please take me there.

21659.「それでは <pc>。\n 余は そちの後を ついていくでな。\n しっかり 頼:
Let us depart as well, <pc>.
I will follow behind you!

21660.「これが 古代の転送装置じゃ。\n ……まあ 余にとっては\n 現役の シロモノ:
This is the ancient transporter.
...Well, to me, I suppose I shouldn't
call it ancient.

21662.「……皆 そろったようじゃな。\n それでは 余が作った 三闘士のオノで\n 転:
...That's everyone, then. With that, I will
now activate the transporter with the Axe
I have created!

21664.「そのオノが できたのは <cs_pchero>が\n 材料を 集めてきてくれた:
I think you should properly thank <cs_pchero>
hereーafter all, <if_woman>she's<else>he's<endif> the one who
gathered the materials to make the Axe, right?

21665.「自分ひとりのチカラだけじゃ\n そのオノも できなかったんだから。\n ……ね:
So you couldn't have made that all by
yourself.
...Right?

21667.「わかってくれれば いいのよ。\n さあ 行きましょう！:
As long as you understand, then that's fine by
me. All right, let's go!

21668.「よし！ それでは 転送装置を動かすぞえ！: Very good! Let us activate the transporter!

21669.「……オノが導くは 母なる大地を見守る\n 三闘士の ふところ カルサドラ火山な:
The Axe leads the way to the bosom of the
Triad who watch over our mother earthー
the Calsadora Volcano!

21673.「よいか？ 火口付近に着いたら\n グルヤンラシュが 儀式をしている場所を\n:
When we enter the crater, you must find the
place where Guryan Rush is performing the
ritual! I'm counting on your success!

21674.「すごい……！\n これが 古代の技術……。:
How amazing! So this is what ancient
technology is like...

21675.古代の転送装置のチカラで\n<cs_pchero>と ビャン・ダオと チリは\n:
The ancient transporter sends <cs_pchero>,
Byan Dao, and Chiri to a location close to
the Calsadora Volcano's crater.

21676.「……よし。皆 そろったようじゃな。\n それでは 余の作った 三闘士のオノを使:
All right. It seems that everyone is here.
Then let's use the Triad Axe I made and go to
Calsadora Volcano.

21677.「……オノが導くは 母なる大地を見守る\n 三闘士の ふところ カルサドラ火山な:
The Axe leads the way to the bosom of the
Triad who watch over our mother earthー
the Calsadora Volcano!

21679.古代の転送装置のチカラで\n<cs_pchero>と ビャン・ダオと チリは\n:
The ancient transporter sends <cs_pchero>,
Byan Dao, and Chiri to a location close to
the Calsadora Volcano's crater.

21680.「確かに すごい数の魔物ね。\n いったい 何をしているの？:
Certainty a lot of monsters here.
Just what are they doing?

21681.「さあ 祈れ！ 祈りつづけよ！\n この世のすべてを 終わらせる……\n あの:
Come on, pray! Keep praying! You must pray
without end, not until the One appears!
They will bring an end to this world!

21684.「……これ以上 好きにはさせぬ！\n 今こそ 貴様を 亡き者にしてくれるわ！:
This stops now! It is time for you to know
death!

21685.「キシャシャシャ……。\n 邪魔立てしようとて もう手遅れじゃ……。\n 間もな:
Kee hee hee... Even if you try to interfere,
it's already too late... Before long, the One
will descend from the skies...

21686.「あの お方じゃと……！？\n さては そやつが グルヤンラシュじゃな！？: "The One"...?! You must mean Guryan Rush!!

21688.「ついに 姿を現したか……！\n 乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュッ！！:
You've revealed yourself at last!
Messenger of chaos and wicked ministerー
Guryan Rush!!

21689.「乱世の使者だあ……？\n オレさまは そんなダセえ名前じゃねえ！:
Messenger of chaos...?
I'd NEVER be called something so lame!!

21690.「オレさまは こいつらを束ねる……\n 魔鳥の頭目さまだアアア！:
*I'M* the one who leads this lot...
The Bird Boss!!!

21692.「……ねえ ビャンくん。\n あなた そのグルなんとかってヤツの顔\n 見たこと:
Say, Byan... Do you even know what this
Gur-whatever guy looks like?

21693.「聞けッ！ 野郎ども！\n お前らに呼ばれた オレさまは ここへ来る前に\n イ:
Listen up, chumps! You called me here, and
I came up with a killer slogan for just such
an occasion!

21694.「オレたちのスローガン。それは……\n この恐怖！ カルサドラ発！ ……だアアア:
And our slogan is...
"Terror takes flightーstraight from
Calsadora!" Yeaaaah!!

21695.「このカルサドラから ドワチャッカ大陸を\n 恐怖のドン底に 突き落としてやろう:
We'll plunge this entire continent into the
depths of true terror!!

21697.「よーし。その手始めに オレたちの野望を\n 邪魔しようとする こいつらを\n:
Now then... First things first. We'll plunge
these losers into the depths of true terror!

21698.「いくぞ 野郎ども！！\n 魔鳥軍団の旗揚げじゃアアア！！！:
Come on, you chumps!
Glory to the Bird Brigade!!

21699.「<cs_pchero>！ チリ！ 来るぞよ！\n 我がカタキ グルヤンラシュを:
Here they come! Together, we must strike
down my greatest enemy!

21700.「おいおい！ 信じられねーぜ！！\n こりずに また やられに来たってのかあ！？:
What's this?! I can't believe it!
You really came back for another beating,
huh?! Didn't you learn your lesson?!

21701.「グヒャヒャヒャヒャ！ いいぜえ！\n そういうことなら お望みどおり もういっ:
Gyee hee hee hee! Fine by me! If that's what
you really want, I'll show the depths of true
terror once again!

21702.「<cs_pchero>！ 来るぞよ！\n 我がカタキ グルヤンラシュを\n 今:
Here they come! Together, we must strike
down my greatest enemy!

21707.「ど どういうことじゃッ！？\n この者 グルヤンラシュではないのかえッ！？:
W-what is the meaning of this?!
You mean to tell me that you are not
Guryan Rush?!

21708.「先ほどから ワケのわからぬことを！\n グルヤンラシュというのは 乱世の\n:
You've been spouting nothin' but nonsense!
Guryan Rush is the name of the legendary
monster that sparked an age of chaos!

21709.「そんな魔物 今の時代に いるはずがなかろう！\n 貴様 その伝説の魔物と ジャ:
How could that monster still exist today?!
You came all the way here thinkin' that our
Lord Jamirus was the same monster?!

21711.「やめねえか！\n これ以上 オレさまに 恥かかすんじゃねえ！:
Stop that! I won't let you make a fool out
of me any more!!

21712.「野郎ども！！ 出直しじゃアアア！！\n もっと チカラをつけて\n この地に:
You lot! We're heading out!
We'll come back here with even more
of us next time!!

21713.「なんということじゃ……。\n 我が宿敵 グルヤンラシュは\n すでに この世に:
What is going on here...?
Guryan Rush, my greatest enemy...
He is no longer in this world?

21714.「あれほど 強大なチカラを持った\n グルヤンラシュさえ 時の流れの中では\n:
To think that someone as powerful as him
was powerless in the face of the flow of
time... A fragile and fleeting existence...

21715.「奸臣グルヤンラシュの脅威も……\n あの地下帝国 ウルベアの威光も……\n 余:
The threat of the wicked Guryan Rush...
The might of the Urbea Empire... Even the
glory of my beloved Gateria...

21716.「時が すべてを終わらせてしまった……。\n そういうことか……。:
Time has brought an end to all these things...
I see...

21717.「ねえ ビャンくん。\n 確かに あの魔物は グルヤンラシュって\n ヤツじゃな:
Hey, Byan... It is true that that monster
wasn't Guryan Rush, but...

21718.「この地が 守られたのは あなたのおかげよ。\n 本当に ありがとう。:
We wouldn't have been able to protect this
place if not for you. Thank you so much!

21719.「……礼など 不要じゃ。\n 余は そなたたちのために動いたのではない。:
...There's no need for that.
I did not do this for your sake.

21720.「<cs_pchero>よ すまぬ。\n また そちを 振りまわしてしまったな。:
I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>.
I've gone and caused you a deal of
trouble yet again.

21721.「そのわびといっては なんじゃが\n この 三闘士のオノを受け取ってたもれ。\n:
To show my gratitude, I want you to have
this Axe of the Triad. Use it as you see fit.

21722.「これは そのわびを兼ねた 礼じゃ。\n 受け取ってたもれ。:
This is both a token of my gratitude and an
apology. Please take it.

21723.「……余の復讐は 終わった。\n いや…… はじめから 復讐など\n なかったの:
My thirst for revenge is over.
No...there was never any revenge
to begin with...

21724.「リウ老師……。\n そなたもまた グルヤンラシュのように\n 時の流れの中に:
Master Liu...
You too have faded into the flow of time...

21727.「……すまぬ <cs_pchero> チリ。\n 余は すべての希望を 失ってし:
My apologies... I have lost any hope I had
left, and can no longer think straight...

21728.「ひとまず ガラクタ城に戻るぞよ……。\n ふたりとも 世話になったな……。:
For now, I will return to the Junk Castle.
Both of youーthank you for your help...

21730.「<cs_pchero> ありがとう。\n あなたたちのおかげで\n 安心して:
Thanks, <cs_pchero>.
It's because of you two that we can
have some peace of mind.

21732.「あの子 親に捨てられたって言ってたよね？\n だから 人ごとじゃない気がして…:
He said his parents abandoned him, right?
I know just what that feels like...

21733.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。\n ビャンくんのこと しっかり 面倒見てあげて:
Take care of Byan for me, okay?
Help him find some kind of hope...

21734.「それじゃ 私は 行くね！\n また どこかで会いましょう！: Anyways, I'm off! We'll meet again soon!
